com.bws.jdistil.core.servlet
Class Loader

java.lang.Object
  com.bws.jdistil.core.servlet.Loader

public class Loader
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides static methods used to load objects with data contained in a servlet request.

Author:
- Bryan Snipes

Method Summary
static int getInstanceCount(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request, java.lang.Object object)
          Returns an instance count for a given object.
static void load(ISecurityManager securityManager, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Action action, java.lang.Object object)
          Loads data into an instance of this class using the first instance of data contained in a given HTTP servlet request.
static void load(ISecurityManager securityManager, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, Action action, java.lang.Object object, int instance)
          Loads page specific data into an instance of this class using data contained in a given HTTP servlet request.

Method Detail

getInstanceCount

public static int getInstanceCount(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request,
                                   java.lang.Object object)
Returns an instance count for a given object. Instance numbers are appended as a suffix to the field ID.

Parameters:
request - - Servlet request object.
object - - Target object.
Returns:
int - Instance count.

load

public static void load(ISecurityManager securityManager,
                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                        Action action,
                        java.lang.Object object)
                 throws ServletException
Loads data into an instance of this class using the first instance of data contained in a given HTTP servlet request. Security manager is used to avoid loading hidden and read only field values.

Parameters:
securityManager - - Security manager.
request - - HTTP servlet request.
action - - Submitted action.
object - - Object to load.
Throws:
ServletException

load

public static void load(ISecurityManager securityManager,
                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                        Action action,
                        java.lang.Object object,
                        int instance)
                 throws ServletException
Loads page specific data into an instance of this class using data contained in a given HTTP servlet request. Security manager is used to avoid loading hidden and read only field values.

Parameters:
securityManager - - Security manager.
request - - HTTP servlet request.
action - - Submitted action.
object - - Object to load.
instance - - Instance number.
Throws:
ServletException
